title.abbrev: Appeal to Return Unused IP Networks to IANA

front.title: An Appeal to the Internet Community to Return Unused IP Networks (Prefixes) to the IANA

abstract.t: This document is an appeal to the Internet community to return unused address space, i.e. any block of consecutive IP prefixes, to the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) or any of the delegated registries, for reapportionment. Similarly an appeal is issued to providers to return unused prefixes which fall outside their customary address blocks to the IANA for reapportionment.
